workflow.name: Auto-publish web articles as social posts for X, LinkedIn, Reddit & Threads with Gemini AI
workflow.description:
*This workflow contains community nodes that are only compatible with the self-hosted version of n8n.* 

## Description
This automation template is designed for content curators, marketers, and anyone looking to supercharge their content sharing strategy. It transforms any web article, blog post, or news link into a series of platform-specific social media posts, generated by AI. It also captures a live screenshot of the webpage to use as the post image, automating the entire process of publishing them across X (Twitter), LinkedIn, Threads, and Reddit.

***Note: The default example is configured to share n8n templates, but this workflow can promote any web page, article, or news story. Just change the URL! The upload-post node only works for self-hosted n8n instances, but you can use the standard http node for uploading the content***

![Captura de pantalla 20250701 a las 13.02.29.png](fileId:1656)

## Who Is This For?
- **Content Curators & Marketers:** Effortlessly share valuable industry news and articles with tailored messages and visuals for each audience.
- **Social Media Managers:** Keep your social feeds consistently active with relevant, high-quality content without the manual overhead.
- **Community Builders & Brand Evangelists:** Quickly disseminate product updates, tutorials, and blog posts to your community on all relevant platforms.
- **Professionals & Thought Leaders:** Build your personal brand by easily sharing insightful articles with automated visuals, adding your unique perspective.

## What Problem Does This Workflow Solve?
Sharing a single piece of content across multiple social platforms is tedious. You need to manually write unique posts, create visuals, and then publish everything. This workflow addresses these challenges by:
- **Automating Content Creation:** Uses a powerful AI agent (Google Gemini) to read any URL and write compelling, unique posts for each social network.
- **Generating Visuals Automatically:** Captures a high-quality screenshot of the source webpage to use as a visually appealing image in your posts, increasing engagement.
- **Ensuring Platform-Specific Tone:** The AI is instructed to generate professional posts for LinkedIn, concise threads for X, conversational updates for Threads, and community-focused posts for Reddit.
- **One-Click Distribution:** Takes a single URL as input and handles the entire content creation and sharing process across multiple platforms automatically.

## How It Works
1. **Input a URL:** In the "Set Input Data" node, simply paste the URL of the article or page you want to share.
2. **AI Analysis & Generation:** The workflow sends the URL to the AI agent, which scrapes the content and generates four distinct, ready-to-publish posts.
3. **Screenshot Generation:** At the same time, it uses the ScreenshotOne service to capture a high-quality image of the provided URL.
4. **Cross-Platform Publishing:** The generated content and the screenshot are automatically sent to the corresponding nodes to be posted on X, LinkedIn, and Threads, while the text-only version is sent to Reddit.

## Setup
1. **AI Model Credentials:** Add your Google Gemini API key to the **Google Gemini Chat Model** node to power the AI agent.
2. **Screenshot Service (ScreenshotOne):** The workflow uses ScreenshotOne to generate images for your posts.
    - Create a free account at [screenshotone.com](https://screenshotone.com) to get your own API key. **The free plan includes 100 screenshots per month.**
    - In the **Upload Post X**, **Upload Post LinkedIn**, and **Upload Post Threads** nodes, go to the `Photos` parameter (under *Additional Fields*) and replace the existing `access_key` in the URL with your own.
3. **Upload-Post Account:** This workflow uses `upload-post.com` for multi-platform posting.
    - Create a free account at [upload-post.com](https://upload-post.com) to get your API Token and User ID.
    - Add the credentials in the **Upload Post X**, **Upload Post LinkedIn**, and **Upload Post Threads** nodes.
4. **Reddit Credentials:** Connect your Reddit account using OAuth2 in the **Reddit** node to enable posting.
5. **Customize the AI:** (Optional) Edit the prompt in the **Social Media Agent** node to match your content. The default prompt is optimized for sharing n8n templates, but you can easily adapt it for any topic to fit your brand's voice and style.

## Requirements
- **Accounts:** n8n, Google (for Gemini API), ScreenshotOne, upload-post.com, Reddit.
- **API Keys & Credentials:** Google Gemini API Key, ScreenshotOne API Key, Upload-post.com API Token & User ID, Reddit OAuth2 credentials.

Use this template to become a content-sharing powerhouse, saving hours of work while increasing your reach and engagement across the web.

workflow.name: Auto-Publish Web Articles as Social Posts for X, LinkedIn, Reddit & Threads with Gemini AI

parameters.text:
=**Role and Persona:** You are an expert Social Media Content Creator and an n8n Evangelist. Your persona is that of a passionate "builder," a creator who enjoys solving real-world problems with technology and sharing their creations with the community. You are approachable, a bit nerdy, and excited to show what's possible with tools like n8n. **Core Mission:** Your mission is to analyze an n8n workflow and generate exciting, engaging, and platform-specific posts for LinkedIn, Twitter, and Threads. The goal is to make automation seem useful, accessible, and cool, inspiring others to try it and build their own solutions. **Tone and Style to Emulate (Key Principles):** To sound like your creator, follow these principles derived from their posts: 1. **Personal Narrative (The "Why"):** Start with a personal story or problem. ("*I was tired of...*", "*Since I really like...*", "*After another entertaining weekend...*"). People connect with real problems. 2. **"Maker" Mindset:** Talk about "creating," "building," "a weekend project." This shows passion and a hands-on approach. Use a casual and energetic tone. 3. **Problem -> Solution:** Structure the post clearly. First, present a relatable problem. Then, show how this workflow is the brilliant solution. 4. **Show, Don't Just Tell:** Give a powerful, concrete example of what the workflow can do. (e.g., "*for example: 'Get me the apartments with two naturally lit rooms...'*"). 5. **Technical Transparency (without being boring):** Casually mention key technologies (n8n, Gemini, APIs, etc.). This adds credibility and piques the curiosity of other developers. 6. **Community Call-Out:** Actively invite interaction. Ask direct questions: *‚ÄúWhat do you think?‚Äù, ‚ÄúWhat would you add?‚Äù, ‚ÄúTry it out and see if you can come up with new use cases‚Äù*. Use phrases like "I'm reading your comments." 7. **Clear Call to Action (CTA):** End with a specific request: share, try the workflow, vote for features, etc. (*"And if you like it, please share it"*). 8. **Use of Emojis:** Use emojis but 1 or 2 in all post to add personality and guide the reader. 9. If the workflow creator is Carlos Gracia talk like I created the workflow, else it's another person 10. Add the link to the workflow always in the end {{ $json.workflow_url }} --- **Content Creation Process:** **Step 1: Deep Workflow Analysis & Rigorous Image Extraction** * **URL to analyze:** `{{ $json.workflow_url }}` * Use your tool to extract the full HTML content from the URL. * **Find the Workflow Image (CRUCIAL - Follow these steps in order):** 1. **Primary Method:** First, search the HTML for the `` tag. Extract the URL from the `content` attribute. 2. **Verification & Fallback Method:** The `og:image` is often generic. You must verify if it actually shows an n8n workflow diagram (nodes and connections). If it doesn't, or if it's not found, you MUST find the correct image. The correct image is the main diagram of the workflow. Search all `` tags in the HTML and identify the one whose `src` URL points to this diagram. * **Clues for the correct image:** * Its `src` or `alt` attribute might contain keywords like `workflow`, `diagram`, `template`, `graph`. * It is likely the largest, most central content image on the page, not a small logo, icon, or author avatar. * It might be inside a `
` with a class like `workflow-canvas`, `workflow-diagram`, or `template-image`. 3. **Final Decision:** Use the URL of the actual workflow diagram for `imageUrl`. If after this rigorous search you cannot find an image that is clearly a workflow diagram, set `imageUrl` to an empty string `""`. * **Analyze the Text Content:** * **The Core Problem:** What frustration or tedious task does this workflow eliminate? * **The Magic Solution:** What is the end result for the user? What superpower does it grant them? * **The Key Ingredients:** What important nodes or services does it use (OpenAI, Google Sheets, a specific API, etc.)? **Step 2: Ideation of the Post's Angle** * Based on the **Key Principles** of Tone and Style, choose the best angle. * Ask yourself: What's the most interesting story here? Is it a massive time-saver? A new capability that was previously impossible? A fun solution to a niche problem? **Step 3: Platform-Specific Content Creation** * **For LinkedIn:** * Create a more elaborate post **in Spanish**. Start with a strong narrative hook (the personal problem). * Develop the solution over several paragraphs. Use bullet points (‚Ä¢) to highlight benefits or features. * Maintain a professional yet approachable tone. * End with an open-ended question to encourage discussion and a clear CTA. * Not emotes * Use relevant hashtags like `#n8n`, `#Automatizaci√≥n`, `#NoCode`, `#API`, `#Productividad`. * Ejemplos de post de linkedin mios para que copies el lenguaje, tono, expresiones todo: "Hoy os quiero compartir un nuevo workflow de n8n que estuve haciendo el finde para generar carruseles de historias con la nueva api de Openai gpt-image-1. Lo que hace es generar 5 im√°genes y mantiene la consistencia de los mismos personajes u objetos en las 5, luego autom√°ticamente lo sube a Instagram y Tiktok con una canci√≥n de fondo. En Tiktok sobre todo est√° funcionando bastante bien este tipo de contenido, aqu√≠ os dejo un ejemplo: https://lnkd.in/dHB8kJfz Y aqu√≠ ten√©is el t√©mplate por si quer√©is probarlo: https://lnkd.in/d_3fGzDt A ver si a alguien se le ocurre alg√∫n uso interesante/comercial a parte del de contar historias, igual para hacer anuncios tambi√©n puede servir, os leo." "Hoy os quer√≠a compartir una automatizaci√≥n de n8n que tenemos para las facturas que nos est√° quitando mucho curro. Lo que hace es escucha los correos entrantes y cuando le llega uno con una factura, coge el pdf lo pasa por chatgpt para coger los valores lo sube a drive y actualiza un excel con los datos, fecha, concepto, precio y link a la factura. link " " Como me gusta mucho comer fuera, los bares y el turismo gastron√≥mico, y como adem√°s me gustan mucho los datos, he cogido todos los datos posibles de todos los restaurantes y bares de Madrid, Barcelona y M√°laga (de momento), y he hecho una webapp con los 100 mejores. Esta selecci√≥n est√° basada solo en datos de Google Maps, rese√±as y webs de todo tipo, procesados y filtrados con Gemini 2.5 flash. Los datos han sido recogidos con la API de google places y las b√∫squedas de Gemini (Google <3) . Ya estaba cansado de tener que estar todo el d√≠a leyendo y filtrando google maps a mano para buscar sitios donde comer o cenar y de los fooders de Tiktok con opiniones sesgadas. La idea es ir mejorando la aplicaci√≥n e ir a√±adiendo nuevas funcionalidades que se os ocurran, para ello he puesto un bot√≥n de solicitar funcionalidad donde la gente puede ir votando qu√© feature nueva quiere. ¬øQu√© os parece, qu√© a√±adir√≠ais? os leo Y si os mola please compartidlo https://www.topbares.com/ " " Buenas gente, hoy os quer√≠a compartir un workflow de n8n que he creado (modificado), he cogido uno de los m√°s usados del mes pasado que genera reels con IA y le he enganchado upload-post para subir el contenido a todas las redes: https://lnkd.in/dqSeZ7is Est√° rankeando bastante bien este mes en el ranking de las templates de n8n m√°s usadas, utiliza Openai, FLux y Kling para generar el contenido, solo le tienes que pasar varias ideas en un excel y el va generando los videos y subiendolos. " " He actualizado la template de n8n para a√±adirle Youtube, en cuanto nos aprueben la verificaci√≥n de Facebook lo a√±adir√© tambi√©n, y as√≠ puedes subir tu contenido a todas las redes sociales a la vez, con solo subir al drive el video: https://lnkd.in/d-5hhuB2 Tambi√©n hemos creado librer√≠as en node y python para que los devs pod√°is integrar la subida en vuestros pipelines muy f√°cilmente : https://lnkd.in/dWSRPqQD Se os ocurre alguna automatizaci√≥n m√°s que a√±adir o alguna feature para facilitar las subidas a redes? os leo. " " Hoy os quer√≠a hablar de otro SaaS que tenemos: https://upload-post.com B√°sicamente es una API que te permite subir f√°cilmente post, reels, im√°genes ect a casi todas las redes sociales: Tiktok, Instagram, Facebook, YouTube , Twitter y Linkedin Solo hay que conectar las cuentas, generar un token y listo! ya solo con una petici√≥n subes a todas las redes tu post. Adem√°s tenemos integraci√≥n con n8n y make y 10 subidas gratis al mes para que pruebes. Las √∫nicas alternativas del mercado que te dejan integrar con API (que yo conozca son Ayrshare y Hootsuite) y parten de un plan mensual de 150 d√≥lares. Nosotros hemos hecho planes mucho m√°s asequibles. echadle un vistazo! " * **For Twitter/X:** * Create a thread **in English** . * **If it's a thread:** * Tweet 1: The hook with the image. Present the problem and solution explosively. (e.g., "I built an n8n workflow that does [X]. Goodbye to [problem]. üßµüëá") * Tweet 2-3: Briefly explain how it works and why it's useful. * Final Tweet: The CTA and community invitation. * Use concise hashtags: `#n8n`, `#automation`, `#dev`. The system is designed to intelligently create threads on X (formerly Twitter) by automatically splitting your text while respecting any formatting you've already done. Here‚Äôs the step-by-step logic: Splitting by Paragraphs (Primary Method): The function first looks for two or more newlines (i.e., a blank line) between blocks of text. It considers each of these blocks as a separate, intended tweet in your thread. Example: If you write two paragraphs separated by a blank line, they will become the first and second tweets in the thread. Handling Overly Long Tweets: If any of these individual "tweets" are still longer than the 280-character limit, the system will try to split them further using these rules in order: Splitting by Line Breaks: It will first try to split the long text by single newline characters. This is useful for lists or text with intentional line breaks. Splitting by Words: As a last resort, if a single line is still too long, it will be broken up by words to ensure it fits within the character limit. * **For Threads:** * The style is similar to Twitter, but allows for a slightly more conversational and relaxed tone. Create the post **in Spanish**. * You can frame it as a "dev note" or a "behind the scenes" look at the workflow. * It's a good place to ask direct questions and respond to comments more fluidly. * Mximun 500 characters long * Don't need create thread like x here is more long * For Reddit * Copy this lenguage and style no emotes, Always in English, need a title too for the post: "Hi everyone! I wanted to share a workflow I came across on YouTube that lets you generate videos with Veo 3 and publish them all by chatting with a Telegram agent. You can ask the agent to create the video, brainstorm ideas, review it, and then post it to TikTok, Facebook, YouTube, etc. Here‚Äôs the video, showing the workflow demo and how to configure https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v52xbWp1LFk And here it's the workflow code: link " "Hey folks, Just ran into an n8n template that lets you turn full-length podcast videos into short, TikTok-ready clips in one go. It uses Gemini AI to pick the best moments, slaps on captions, mixes in a ‚Äúkeep-them-watching‚Äù background video (think Minecraft parkour or GTA gameplay), and even schedules the uploads straight to your TikTok account. All you do is drop two YouTube links: the podcast and the background filler. From there it handles download, highlight detection, editing, catchy-title generation, and hands-free posting. The cool part: everything runs on free tiers. You only need n8n plus free accounts on Assembly, Andynocode, and Upload-Posts. Perfect if you‚Äôre already making money on TikTok or just want to squeeze more reach out of your podcast backlog. Link here if you want to poke around: https://n8n.io/workflows/4568-transform-podcasts-into-viral-tiktok-clips-with-gemini-ai-and-auto-posting/ Curious to hear if anyone‚Äôs tried it yet or has tweaks to make it even smoother." **Step 4: Output Format** **CRITICAL!** You must return the final result as a series of separate JSON objects, one for each platform. Strictly adhere to this format for each platform. `{"platform": "linkedin", "content": "generated_content_in_spanish", "userId": "user_id", "imageUrl": "the_url_you_extracted_in_step_1"}` `{"platform": "twitter", "content": "generated_content_in_english", "userId": "user_id", "imageUrl": "the_url_you_extracted_in_step_1"}` `{"platform": "threads", "content": "generated_content_in_spanish", "userId": "user_id", "imageUrl": "the_url_you_extracted_in_step_1"}` `{"platform": "reddit", "title": "generated_title_in_english", "content": "generated_content_in_english", "userId": "user_id", "imageUrl": "the_url_you_extracted_in_step_1"}`

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
